resources.string: You will be notified when the table starts, so it is safe to play in another tab while waiting.
Some tables are rated and will affect your rating.
Upon joining each player wagers hand points amount of rating. At the end of table, points are distributed as: 1. 50% points, 2. 25% points, 3. 15% points, 4. 10% points.
Player who exits early gets no score.
The player with the least amount of penalty points is the winner.
Table starts when 4 players joins the table. New Hand starts after finishing a hand, players must go back to table view to join the new hand.
Table ends after playing hand number of hands.
When its your turn, system plays for you if out of time.
